svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 140px; margin-left: 252px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000; background-color: #ffffff;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); white-space: nowrap;

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(0, 0, 0)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 168px; height: 1px; padding-top: 240px; margin-left: 131px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

path.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 148px; height: 1px; padding-top: 345px; margin-left: 321px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Don't bother with a distributed setup. The benefits won't be realized for a one-time need

div.div: A basic, fully parallel distributed setup can get the job done quickly

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 148px; height: 1px; padding-top: 35px; margin-left: 531px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

div.div: Use sharding & a mature distributed framework to save significant time at scale
